import Button from '@mui/material/Button' import { useStore } from './store' import { GET_API_REQUEST, GET_API_SUCCESS, GET_API_ERROR } from './store/constant' function App() { const [state, dispatch] = useStore() const newData = [] console.log(state) const handleGetApi = () => { dispatch({ type: GET_API_REQUEST }) fetch('https://reqres.in/api/users') .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => { dispatch({ type: GET_API_SUCCESS, data: res.data }) }) .catch(err => { dispatch({ type: GET_API_ERROR }) }) } return (
